Class HTTPIO

java.lang.Object
  jade.mtp.http2.HTTPIO

public class HTTPIO
extends java.lang.Object

HTTPIO.java. Http parsing class for JADE HTTP MTP.

Version:
0.1, 1.0, 1.1
Author:
Jose Antonio Exposito, MARISM-A Development group ( marisma-info@ccd.uab.es ), Nicolas Lhuillier (Motorola Labs), Ahti Syreeni - TeliaSonera

Method Detail

useHtmlResponses

public static void useHtmlResponses(boolean use)
Sets whether HTML-response messages should be added to HTTP responses. This is optional in FIPA specification.

Parameters:
use - If set true, HTML-messages will be added to all HTTP-responses.

                                cascom.fipa.util.BufferedInputStream input)

Parse the input message, this message is received from the master server

input - The entire unprocessed http-request as input stream

testOutput

public static void testOutput(java.io.OutputStream out)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Tests the output stream by writing a few bytes so that can be sured that writing to the output does not cause exceptions. The bytes are actually an empty line so that parsing will not be disturbed at receiving parse-method.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If such occures while writing to output.
